head.title: Search in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{ProgLang}} applications with efficient text search across various business document formats.

header.title: Search for text in business documents
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enables powerful and flexible text searches in your documents. Easily integrate search functionality into {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful library for efficient text search and document indexing. It supports over 70 file formats, including industry-standard documents such as PDF, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Improve search performance with fast and accurate results.

more_features.title: Advanced searching features
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} enables sophisticated text searches across more than 70 file formats. Indexing improves search efficiency and helps manage document content effectively.

feature_1.title: Advanced text search
feature_1.content: Extract relevant text from popular business documents, including PDFs, Word files, presentations, and spreadsheets. Supports multiple search techniques such as fuzzy search, homophone detection, and wildcards.

feature_2.title: Optimized indexing for faster searches
feature_2.content: Build and reuse search indexes to enhance search speed. Indexing optimizes performance when searching through large document collections.

feature_3.title: Support for multiple languages
feature_3.content: Perform searches in documents written in over 80 languages. Detects different keyboard layouts and word variations to improve accuracy.

feature_4.title: Flexible search settings
feature_4.content: Refine search results with customizable options, including filters, regular expressions, and case sensitivity settings.

formats.title: Find data in your business documents
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports 70+ file formats, allowing efficient processing and searching of popular office documents.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Perform accurate and efficient data searches.

examples.comment_1: Path to store the reusable search index
examples.comment_3: Search only within specific file formats

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) enables efficient text searches in {{FileFormatUp}} documents, making it ideal for {{EnvName}} applications.

content.step_2: Select the folder containing your files.
content.step_3: Configure search options to process only {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
content.step_4: Execute the search and retrieve results.

code_1.content: Learn how to narrow down document searches using filters

code_1.comment_4: Process and use the search output
